overview: In “Queen Vee”, director Melissa Johnson draws back the curtain on the life of Violet Palmer, who is one of the best officials in the league, male or female. While players, family and her fellow zebras attest to her excellence, game footage demonstrates her uncanny ability to maintain both control and humanity at the same time. As her mother Gussie’s favorite player, Kobe Bryant, says, “She does a kick-ass job.
title: Queen Vee
